title: builder: DragonFly buildbot is more flaky than passing
body:
The Dragonfly BSD builder is failing more often than it's passing lately on https://build.golang.org/

If we can't get it more reliable, it might be time to drop the port.

Can somebody give it some love?

/cc @fupjack, Dragonfly builder owner
/cc @mdempsky, @mikioh, @minux, @4a6f656c (previous BSD interest)
